ValidationRule.description: If Marital Status = Married then validate spouse name must be filled with alphabet
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(Spouse_Name__c), ISNULL(Spouse_Name__c),Spouse_Name__c= ""),FALSE, OR(AND( ISPICKVAL(Marital_Status__c , "KAWIN"), NOT(REGEX( Spouse_Name__c , "^[a-zA-Z ]*$")) )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Some character are not allowed, for example / \ :*?"<>|
